name: polymorphism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ]
  science
  specialized the fact that something such as an animal or organism can exist in different forms: Compounds that exist in more than one crystalline form are said to exhibit polymorphism.
[ C ]
  biology
  specialized a genetic variation: a polymorphism that may have protected ancestral populations from a form of malaria
